Merge pull request #445 from sikrinick/feature/gradle_build_tools_update

Updated build tools and gradle

Update .aar download link in Readme

Update .aar download link to match the one specified in gradle dependency.

Fix using the same string for Toolbar (sub)title

Currently the same string (" ") is set on Toolbar's title and subtitle.
This means that the factory is unable to determine whether a given
TextView inside of a Toolbar is the title or the subtitle. The
consequence is that the font is not applied properly to the subtitle.

Merge pull request #122 from fingertricks/pr/121

Remove OnGlobalLayoutListener after use (more Lint-friendly) Fixes #121 #102
Lint: Empty 'catch' block
Resolve lint issue for deprecated removeGlobalLayoutListener()

Remove OnGlobalLayoutListener after use

Whether or not there are any children, we need to make sure that we
don't keep listening for global layout changes; it's unnecessary work
plus it also sticks around until the Activity is killed.

Addresses #102
Update CHANGELOG.md
